title: Implement list repository contents endpoint
body:
GET /repos/{owner}/{repo}/contents with optional ?ref; read-only; allowlist enforced. See docs/API_SPEC.md and docs/ARCHITECTURE.md.

---
Status: In Review
Done:
- Implemented and E2E-tested repo browsing endpoints
Commit: [57268da45320bbaddeebb0527656dca2b932e77e](https://github.com/mGavryshchuk/GitHub_Connector/commit/57268da45320bbaddeebb0527656dca2b932e77e)

title: TEST: Connector create issue
body: E2E test for create issue via bridge

title: Versioning and release notes
body: Define versioning policy and changelog process. Automate release notes generation. See [ROADMAP.md](https://github.com/mGavryshchuk/GitHub_Connector/blob/master/docs/ROADMAP.md).

title: Usage docs and examples
body:
Write Quickstart in README with example `docker run` and API calls. Provide example requests and curl scripts. See [README.md](https://github.com/mGavryshchuk/GitHub_Connector/blob/master/README.md).

---
Status: In Review
Done:
- Added Quickstart and curl examples; documented PAT env; Docker run instructions
Commit:
- [6c688a62a463437d95ea82ed1b73ff59005b267e](https://github.com/mGavryshchuk/GitHub_Connector/commit/6c688a62a463437d95ea82ed1b73ff59005b267e)
Files changed:
- [README.md](https://github.com/mGavryshchuk/GitHub_Connector/blob/master/README.md)
- [Dockerfile](https://github.com/mGavryshchuk/GitHub_Connector/blob/master/Dockerfile)
- [docs/AUTH.md](https://github.com/mGavryshchuk/GitHub_Connector/blob/master/docs/AUTH.md)

title: CD: publish image to registry
body: Automate image publishing to a chosen registry with version tags and provenance. See [ROADMAP.md](https://github.com/mGavryshchuk/GitHub_Connector/blob/master/docs/ROADMAP.md).

title: CI: lint/test/build Docker image
body: Set up CI to lint, run tests, build the Docker image, and publish artifacts. See [ROADMAP.md](https://github.com/mGavryshchuk/GitHub_Connector/blob/master/docs/ROADMAP.md).

title: Secrets management and configuration docs
body: Document required env vars and secret handling. Provide `.env.example` and guidance for local/prod. See [ROADMAP.md](https://github.com/mGavryshchuk/GitHub_Connector/blob/master/docs/ROADMAP.md).

title: Rate limiting/backoff for GitHub API
body: Implement safe retries with exponential backoff and handle GitHub rate limits using headers. Bubble up clear client messaging. See [ROADMAP.md](https://github.com/mGavryshchuk/GitHub_Connector/blob/master/docs/ROADMAP.md).

title: Request logging, correlation IDs, baseline metrics
body: Add structured logs, per-request correlation ID, and basic metrics (requests, latency, errors). Document how to toggle verbosity. See [ROADMAP.md](https://github.com/mGavryshchuk/GitHub_Connector/blob/master/docs/ROADMAP.md).

title: Error handling and standardized error responses
body: Define error envelope (`code`, `message`, `details`) and map upstream GitHub errors consistently. Add correlation IDs. See [ROADMAP.md](https://github.com/mGavryshchuk/GitHub_Connector/blob/master/docs/ROADMAP.md).

title: Input/output validation from OpenAPI schema
body: Enforce schema validation for all requests/responses using the generated validators. Fail fast with helpful errors. See [API_SPEC.md](https://github.com/mGavryshchuk/GitHub_Connector/blob/master/docs/API_SPEC.md).

title: Implement add comment endpoint
body:
Implement POST `/repos/{owner}/{repo}/issues/{issue_number}/comments` to add a new comment. See [API_SPEC.md](https://github.com/mGavryshchuk/GitHub_Connector/blob/master/docs/API_SPEC.md).

title: Implement update/close issue endpoint
body: Implement PATCH `/repos/{owner}/{repo}/issues/{issue_number}` supporting title/body/state/labels/assignees. Support closing issues. See [API_SPEC.md](https://github.com/mGavryshchuk/GitHub_Connector/blob/master/docs/API_SPEC.md).

title: Implement create issue endpoint
body:
Implement POST `/repos/{owner}/{repo}/issues` to create issues with title/body/labels/assignees. Return created resource. See [API_SPEC.md](https://github.com/mGavryshchuk/GitHub_Connector/blob/master/docs/API_SPEC.md).

title: Implement get single issue endpoint
body:
Implement GET `/repos/{owner}/{repo}/issues/{issue_number}`. Handle not-found and permission errors. See [API_SPEC.md](https://github.com/mGavryshchuk/GitHub_Connector/blob/master/docs/API_SPEC.md).

title: Implement list issues endpoint
body:
Implement GET `/repos/{owner}/{repo}/issues` with filtering, pagination, and GitHub API proxying. Map query params and return normalized responses. See [API_SPEC.md](https://github.com/mGavryshchuk/GitHub_Connector/blob/master/docs/API_SPEC.md).

---

- Switched to Bearer auth for FG-PAT, added User-Agent, token sanitization
